sentences.en: After a little gentle persuasion , Debbie agreed to let us in.
sentences.cn: 好言劝说了几句后，黛比就同意让我们进去了。

sentences.en: After a lot of persuasion, he finally acquiesced.
sentences.cn: 经过多次劝说, 他最终默许了.

sentences.en: After a lot of persuasion, she agreed to go.
sentences.cn: 经过多次劝说后, 她同意去了.

sentences.en: All our persuasion was of no use.
sentences.cn: 我们所有的劝告都无用.

sentences.en: Even administrative regulations must be accompanied by persuasion and education.
sentences.cn: 就是行政命令也要伴以说服教育.

sentences.en: Fortunately for me, my kids are of the persuasion that their failings are of their own making.
sentences.cn: 对我来说幸运的是，我的孩子们相信失败是他们自己造成的。

sentences.en: He decided to leave only after much persuasion.
sentences.cn: 经过多方劝说,他才决定离开.

sentences.en: He enjoys polemics, persuasion, and controversy.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢辩论、说服和争议。

sentences.en: If he dummies up, just try a little persuasion.
sentences.cn: 如果他不说话, 稍微劝劝他就是了.

sentences.en: It didn't take much persuasion to get her to tell us where he was.
sentences.cn: 我们没费什么口舌就让她说出了他的下落。

sentences.en: It had taken a great deal of persuasion to get him to accept.
sentences.cn: 费尽了口舌才让他接受。

sentences.en: It is my persuasion that the decision was a mistake.
sentences.cn: 我认为那个决定是错误的.

sentences.en: It is my private persuasion that he is right.
Only after much persuasion from Ellis had she agreed to hold a show at all.
sentences.cn: 埃利斯劝了她半天后她才同意办一场展览。

sentences.en: She ruled more by entreaty and persuasion than by command or argument.
sentences.cn: 她也不是靠发号施令和争辩,而是靠央求和规劝来管理的.

sentences.en: She used all her powers of persuasion (= skill at persuading people ) to convince Tilly that it was the right thing to do.
sentences.cn: 她使尽浑身解数，才劝服蒂莉应该那么做。

sentences.en: She was using all her powers of persuasion to induce the Griffins to remain in Rollway.
sentences.cn: 她在极力劝说格里芬斯一家留在罗尔威。

sentences.en: Since you won't yield to persuasion, we'll try what force can do.
sentences.cn: 既然你不听劝阻, 那我们就只好动武了.

words.tran_cn: 有说服力的；劝诱的，劝说的
说服，劝说；使某人相信；劝某人做（不做）某事

trans.tran_en: the act of persuading someone to do something
